data.name: Decompresser_Description
data.value: Uses sex mainly to relieve stress and relax. After a tough day or high pressure, they seek intimacy to unwind, clear their mind, and often get better sleep. Sex is a way to decompress emotionally and physically.

data.name: Decompresser_Name
data.value: Decompresser

data.name: Explorer_Description
data.value: Curious and adventurous in bed. Loves trying new things, pushing boundaries, and doesn’t take sex too seriously. Playful, open-minded, and enjoys intellectual and physical exploration during intimacy.

data.name: Explorer_Name
data.value: Explorer

data.name: FairTrader_Description
data.value: Values balance and reciprocity. Open to discussing desires, willing to compromise, and focuses on giving and receiving pleasure equally. Communication about likes and dislikes is key for them.

data.name: FairTrader_Name
data.value: Fair Trader

data.name: Giver_Description
data.value: Finds pleasure primarily in making their partner feel good. More focused on their partner’s enjoyment than their own, sometimes even uncomfortable receiving pleasure. Very attentive and nurturing in sex.

data.name: Giver_Name
data.value: Giver

data.name: Guardian_Description
data.value: Needs sex to feel safe and consensual. Prioritizes trust, comfort, and emotional security before intimacy. May have past trauma or simply values a secure, slow-building connection.

data.name: Guardian_Name
data.value: Guardian

data.name: PassionPursuer_Description
data.value: Seeks intense, animalistic, and lustful sexual experiences. Lost in raw passion and energy, where time feels suspended. Very physical and uninhibited, aiming for euphoric connection.

data.name: PassionPursuer_Name
data.value: Passion Pursuer

data.name: PleasureSeeker_Description
data.value: Enjoys sex for the pure physical sensations. Doesn’t necessarily require emotional connection, just wants to have fun and experience pleasure. Focused on the tactile and erotic aspects.

data.name: PleasureSeeker_Name
data.value: Pleasure Seeker

data.name: Prioritizer_Description
data.value: Makes sex a non-negotiable daily priority. Regardless of tiredness or busy schedules, sex must happen regularly. Prefers routine and consistency in their sex life.

data.name: Prioritizer_Name
data.value: Prioritizer

data.name: Romantic_Description
data.value: Sex is deeply emotional and meaningful. Prefers slow, sensual intimacy with eye contact, foreplay, and affirming words. Emotional connection is essential for sexual satisfaction.

data.name: Romantic_Name
data.value: Romantic

data.name: Spiritualist_Description
data.value: Sees sex as a transcendent, almost sacred experience. Combines physical, emotional, and spiritual connection. Practices like tantric sex exemplify this type, focusing on energy and deeper unity.

data.name: Spiritualist_Name
data.value: Spiritualist

data.name: ThrillSeeker_Description
data.value: Attracted to taboo and intense experiences. Enjoys BDSM, kinks, fetishes, and pushing sexual boundaries. Loves the excitement of forbidden or unconventional activities.

data.name: ThrillSeeker_Name
data.value: Thrill Seeker
